string-array.name: Tinetti_Balance_question
string-array.item: Nudged (subject at max position with feet as close together as possible, examiner pushes lightly on subject\s sternum with palm of hand 3 times
Eyes Closed (at max position as previous assessment

string-array.name: Tinetti_Balance_answerB
string-array.item: Able, uses arms to help up
Able, requires more then one step
Steady but uses walker or other support
Steady but wide stance (heels 4 inches apart), and uses can or other support
Uses arms or not a smooth motion

string-array.name: Tinetti_Balance_answerC
string-array.item: Steady without walker or other support
Uses arms or not a smooth motion

string-array.name: Tinetti_GAIT_question
string-array.item: Path (estimated in relation to floor tiles, 12 inch diameter. Observe excursion of 1 foot over about 10 feet)

string-array.name: Tinetti_GAIT_answerA
string-array.item: Any hesitancy or multiple attempts to start
RIGHT swing foot does not pass left stance foot with step
RIGHT AND LEFT step length not equal (estimate)
Marked sway or uses walking aid

string-array.name: Tinetti_GAIT_answerB
string-array.item: RIGHT foot passes left stance foot
RIGHT AND LEFT step length not equal (estimate)
Mild/moderate deviation or uses walking aid
No sway - but flexion of knees or back or spread arms out while walking
No sway, no flexion, no use of arms, and no use of walking aid

string-array.name: Tinetti_GAIT_answerC
string-array.item: RIGHT foot passes left stance foot
No sway, no flexion, no use of arms, and no use of walking aid

string-array.name: FRAT_Question
string-array.item: Has the patient had any falls?
Is the patient taking any medication (Sedatives, Anti-Depressants, Anti-Parkinsons, Diurectics, Anti-hypertensives, hypnotics)
Does the patient show signs of any psychological issues (Anxiexy, Depression, Reduction in Cooperation, Inisght or Judgement esp mobility judgement)
Recent change in functional status and / or medications affecting safe mobility (or anticipated)
Does the patient experience experience dizziness / postural hypotension

string-array.name: FRAT_AnswerA
string-array.item: Does not appear to have any of these

string-array.name: FRAT_AnswerB
string-array.item: One or more between 3 and 12 months ago
Appears mildly affected by one or more

string-array.name: FRAT_AnswerC
string-array.item: One or more in last 3 months
Appears moderately affected by one or more

string-array.name: FRAT_AnswerD
string-array.item: One or more in last 3 months whilst inpatient / resident
Appears affected severely by one or more

string-array.name: Morse_Question
string-array.item: History of falling; immediate or within 3 months

string-array.name: Efficacy_Question
string-array.item: Cleaning the house (e.g. sweep, vacuum, dust)
Getting in or out of a chair
Going up or down a stairs
Reaching for something above your head or on the ground
Going to answer the telephone before it stops ringing
Walking on a slippery surface (e.g. wet or icy)
Walking on an uneven surface (e.g. rocky ground, poorly maintained pavement)
Walking up or down a slope
Going out to a social event (e.g. religious service, family gathering, or club meeting)
